8.28.19  2:41 pm   what's the most influenced you've ever been by a question on this page

      i once was influenced straight out of my chair. not even the world's greatest influencers could have influenced me as much

8.28.19  2:05 pm   how much dna do you share with hall and oates?

      maybe 1 to 2 %, but i'm not really sure

8.28.19  2:03 pm   i'm going through my first hurricane season in florida what should i have in my emergency kit

      i have no idea about that. alligators maybe?

8.28.19  1:32 pm   what was the best gift from a person?

      life

8.28.19  1:15 pm   how much storage should i start off with for a basic archiving-everything-i-do setup

      how much have you done so far, and how fast did you do it ..... and do you have any idea what you are going to do? if you're not sure i would suggest 10 megabytes

8.28.19  12:02 pm   Ohio or Wyoming?

      there's got to be somewhere in between

8.28.19  11:24 am   what is the difference between a piano and keyboard(instrument)

      if you say piano, it might be the big ebony/ivory one with all the strings inside, popular in europe 1600s/1700s, and all across the world for centuries after. entirely acousting instrument. if you say keyboard, it could mean any other instrument that uses that same keyboard layout but is not a piano, OR it can be made to sound like a piano. OR a keyboard can mean any thing with a lot of buttons you can press, could be for typing letters, i'm using one right now, .... OR, here's another twist, sometimes if it's digital but it is immitating a piano, it can be called a piano, OR, you might still have to call a digital keyboard a piano even when it doesn't sound like a piano IF you are trying to distinguish it from one you type letters on

8.28.19  10:58 am   what does music taste like?

      like water with very interesting colors flowing through it

      183

      it could be, it all depends on whether you have the right configuration

8.28.19  10:46 am   Is water wet?

      not for long

8.28.19  10:03 am   Can you explain why street signs have so much power over humans?

      they are trying to manage the physical power cars and trucks have

8.28.19  10:02 am   Do you like koalas

      they are never awake so it is hard to really get to know them. but i assume they're good

8.28.19  9:14 am   What do you think about time

      very reliable

8.28.19  7:33 am   do you sometimes feel more spirit than human?

     human is spirit. human was made from spirit

      Because I feel that way, but am working on embracing and balancing my feelings better

8.28.19  6:35 am   i'm learning to play the guitar. Which chords do i learn first?

      learn a chord that has 2 open strings, and one fretted string. the other 3 not playing. start trying different combinations of that and i think you will make some really smooth discoveries early on that you will carry with you

8.28.19  5:40 am   Do trees like to be touched? 

      they like to be lit

8.28.19  5:36 am   Serious question: how can I appreciate life?

      make it into an interesting pattern or design

8.28.19  5:03 am   Do you ever think about how many words you must have read and typed as you answered all these questions?

     hmm, thinking about it now

      And the typos you made that you probably never noticed while answering them? Sends shivers down my spine just thinking about it.

8.28.19  4:59 am   i am hungry. what should i eat

      rations

8.28.19  4:58 am   What's the difference between green, red and purple grapes?

      the color

8.27.19  10:58 pm   thoughts on blimps

      sometimes i'm not sure which way they're supposed to go. then i realize that the blimp is not sure either

8.27.19  10:52 pm   im just curious, how many holes does the average slice of swiss cheese have?

      about 13

8.27.19  10:42 pm   For a live band, would you want one guitarist or two? (Like rhythm and solo or similar)

      if the band is 6 people, there's going to be 1 guitar. if there's 2 guitars, i would imagine the total band size would be around 12 to 14 people. there would be 2 of a lot of things

8.27.19  10:38 pm   I love the moment in "when i get older" of 'when I hear music I get excited' and the tiny synth that plays, that moment with the visual is very funny/memorable 

      a little inside story on that one, it was just a person going up stairs, and it was a last minute decision to make the person fall, and that made all the difference

      still trying to figure out a good way

8.27.19  6:40 pm   What software did you use to make all the 3D effects in your music videos?

8.27.19  6:39 pm   How do I make my spine not hurt while reading through all of these questions? 

      increase the size, and re-work your desk area so the display is a bit higher

8.27.19  6:31 pm   Is your shift key working?

      i have 6 of them and they all work

8.27.19  6:14 pm   Hey Bill! Do you know where to find a good broom?

      online

8.27.19  5:38 pm   How is that new project going that most of your youtube subscribers have been waiting for?

      at this stage it is not so much a project, but more so that i am learning how to make projects. now you may be thinking, what were all those projects before? didn't you already know how to make projects? and the answer is yes, i did know how to make projects, except those were very weak projects

8.27.19  5:27 pm   what exactly is it that you're learning how to do??

      ride a horse which is approximately 64 times faster than the previous horse i was accustomed to

8.27.19  5:01 pm   what is the absolute worst part about mathematics

      there's answers to everything. never leaves anything to the imagination

8.27.19  5:00 pm   are you still saving the tambourine for later?

      that is a fictional video, but i must admit it has become more real than i ever would have imagined
